short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the first 5 templates from the Daily Design Cafe in a popup.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Welcome to the wonderful world of WordPress themes. This extension will display you 5 new premium templates have been published on dailydesign.ca
